alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 3:51PM EDT until August 12 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHEROKEE...EAST CENTRAL BRADLEY...SOUTHEASTERN LOUDON...NORTHERN POLK...SOUTHEASTERN MCMINN...SOUTHWESTERN BLOUNT AND MONROE COUNTIES... At 349 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Lenoir City to 14 miles southeast of Etowah, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. Law enforcement reported trees down across the Sweetwater area in Monroe county. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Maryville, Athens, Loudon, Madisonville, Etowah, Englewood, Vonore, Greenback, Friendsville, and Tellico Plains. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
